worlds.name: Avalonia
worlds.description: A mystical land brimming with ancient magic and diverse biomes.

locations.name: Central Avalonia
locations.description: The heart of Avalonia, home to the Grand Castle and bustling markets.

locations.name: Grand Castle
locations.description: The seat of power for the Avalonian kingdom.

locations.name: The Great Library
locations.description: A vast repository of knowledge, housing the world's greatest collection of books.

locations.name: The Great Bazaar
locations.description: A bustling marketplace, where merchants from all over the world come to sell their wares.

locations.name: The Great Arena
locations.description: A massive coliseum, where the greatest warriors come to test their mettle.

locations.name: The Great Cathedral
locations.description: A massive cathedral, where the devout come to worship the gods.

locations.name: Crystal Lake Village
locations.description: A quaint village known for its crystal clear waters and friendly folk.

locations.name: Eldergrove Forest
locations.description: An old forest, whispered to be the dwelling of the ageless Eldertree.

locations.name: Dreadmount Peaks
locations.description: A treacherous mountain range that guards the realm's northern borders.
